customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my daughter and it was defective out of box. It started with what static on the screen and then just went to a bright screen that I couldn't even turn off. Been talking to tech support since Christmas and they said they couldn't find the serial number and needed a receipt, so finally I told them that I just want a refund cause it was a defective product and they were unwilling to fix their mistake. And they said they can't do refunds... Don't waste your money or time with this terrible company.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Haddon

product_meta.title: KD Interactive Kurio Xtreme 2 Tablet, Blue
product_meta.description: The new kurio Xtreme 2 takes kid tablets to the next level with improved technology, leading safety features, tons of preloaded apps & games and now with award-winning content from Disney! the tablet is preloaded with 4 Disney imagicademy educational apps & games; allowing kids to learn while having fun like never before! plus, once you start using your kurio Xtreme 2, each week for an entire year a new app, game or e-book will be delivered right to your tablet. Every week, you and your child can have fun discovering a new app free of Charge! kurio Xtreme 2 is a serious, full-featured premium 5.0 Android and mediatek powered tablet with a quad-core processor, 7" multi-touch screen, Google play, 16GB of internal memory, Wi-Fi, video (micro-HDMI connector to your TV), 0.3 MPH front and 2.1 MPH rear cameras, speakers and USB and micro SD connections. Kurio Xtreme 2 features the most detailed parental controls and our proprietary kurio genius internet filtering system. The easy-to-use parental area is password-protected and allows parents to set detailed time constraints for every day of the week, to set app and web-surfing restraints and to set up to 8 unique user profiles. The kurio genius internet filtering system, filters inappropriate content from over 500 million websites daily in over 170 languages, so you have peace of mind your child is surfing the Web safely. Includes a screen protector, USB connector and power Adaptor.
feature_bullets: A serious Android tablet with a high-res 7" touch screen, a quad-core processor, Wi-Fi, video and micro-HDMI Connector, cameras, 16Gb of internal memory storage, USB cable and power adaptor
Now preloaded with 4 award-winning Disney imagicademy apps and games! plus, the kurio xtreme 2 is packed with tons of additional apps, games, e-books, music and more!
Every week for an entire year, we'll deliver a new app, game or e-book right to your tablet for you and your child to discover and enjoy!
Includes our proprietary kurio genius internet filtering system, which blocks inappropriate contact from over 500 million websites daily in over 170 different languages
Features the most detailed parental controls - from setting time limits for any day of the week, to managing apps and web usage. Features an rescue Me app giving users 24-7 access to customer care!
